name: Cyber Angels
author: Snowstar Kernel
notes: Best way to beat FTK atm imo, was using LP Boost for most of the climb, switched to Grit and it won me a game against FTK on my KoG set, probably the better skill overall. Hymn protection felt worth, still love the bacon. I'm gonna miss this kind of CA, honestly had a lot of fun this season when I wasnt facing FTK.
